text: Courtney Thorne-Smith (born 8 November 1967) is an American actress. She is best known for her television work. Her television roles include Alison Parker on Melrose Place, Georgia Thomas on the sitcom Ally McBeal and Lyndsey McElroy on Two and a Half Men. She has acted in many movies and other television programs. Thorne-Smith was born in San Francisco, California. == Other websites == * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Francisco Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors
title: Courtney Thorne-Smith
